item.title: A Basic Vulkan Renderer
item.description: As part of the effort to get myself familiar with Vulkan, I developed a real-time renderer featuring global illumination with RTX technique 1. Aside from Dynamic Diffuse Global Illumination (DDGI) 2 3, ray-traced soft shadow and specular reflections with spatial temporal-denoising (SVGF 4), I've also tried out some other interesting ideas.
